article_title: The Obamacare Tax That Cost You $1,200 Last Year

article_metadata.description: The president is traveling the country calling for an increase in the national minimum wage. “It is a clear choice,” the president stated in Connecticut last Thursday. “Raise workers’ wages, grow our economy, or give workers what amounts to another pay cut.” The very next day, a widely circulated report by [...]
